text: Luis Miguel Nlavo Asue (born 30 November 2002) is an Equatorial Guinean footballer who plays as a forward for the youth team of Portuguese club SC Braga and the Equatorial Guinea national team. ==International career== Nlavo made his international debut for Equatorial Guinea on 28 July 2019. In August 2019 he was recalled to the national team. ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Equatorial Guinea's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%;" ! No. !!
